item.description: Amazon Comprehend #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Natural-language processing (NLP) service • Uses machine learning to uncover information in unstructured data • Can identify critical elements in data, including references to language, people, and places, and the text files can be categorized by relevant topics • In real time, you can automatically and accurately detect customer sentiment in your content
AWS Forecast #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Time-series forecasting service • Uses ML and is built for business metrics analysis

Amazon Lex #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Conversational AI for Chatbots • Build conversational interfaces into any application using voice and text • Build bots to increase contact center productivity, automate simple tasks, and drive operational efficiencies across the enterprise

Amazon Polly #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Turns text into lifelike speech • Create applications that talk, and build entirely new categories of speech-enabled products • Text-to-Speech (TTS) service uses advanced deep learning technologies to synthesize natural sounding human speech

Amazon SageMaker #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: Like Google colab, notebook for AWS Helps data scientists and developers to prepare, build, train, and deploy high-quality machine learning (ML) models ML development activities including: • Data preparation • Feature engineering • Statistical bias detection • Auto-ML • Training and tuning • Hosting • Monitoring • Workflows

Amazon Textract #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Automatically extract printed text, handwriting, and data from any document • Features: • Optical character recognition (OCR) • Identifies relationships, structure, and text • Uses AI to extract text and structured data • Recognizes handwriting as well as printed text • Can extract from documents such as PDFs, images, forms, and tables • Understands context.

Amazon Transcribe #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Add speech to text capabilities to applications • Recorded speech can be converted to text before it can be used in applications • Uses a deep learning process called automatic speech recognition (ASR) to convert speech to text quickly and accurately

Amazon Translate #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Neural machine translation service that delivers fast, high-quality, and affordable language translation • Uses deep learning models to deliver more accurate and more natural sounding translation • Localize content such as websites and applications for your diverse users

AWS ML Services #aws #cloud #ai #ml A set of AWS Services which allows use of ML in AWS. Amazon Comprehend Amazon Forecast Amazon Lex Amazon Polly Amazon SageMaker Amazon Textract Amazon Transcribe Amazon Translate AWS Rekognition

AWS Rekognition #aws #cloud #ai #ml Amazon ML service provided by AWS which: • Add image and video analysis to your applications • Identify objects, people, text, scenes, and activities in images and videos • Processes videos stored in an Amazon S3 bucket • Publish completion status to Amazon SNS Topic
